summary: Production readiness implementation plan. Catalogs all mock data, simulated logic, and missing API integrations across the swap-bridge dApp. Covers: removing MOCK_MODE and 3 mock files, cleaning up adapter fallbacks in 1inch/Jupiter/LI.FI, wiring TokenExplorer swap widget to real APIs, creating a Solidity OTC escrow smart contract, and replacing localStorage-only OTC with real on-chain transactions.
